verses.text: (א) I will bless the Lordat all times: His praise shallcontinually bein my mouth.
(ב) My soul shall make her boast in the Lord: The humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.
(ג) O magnify the Lordwith me, And let us exalt his name together.
(ד) I sought the Lord, and he heard me, And delivered me from all my fears.
(ה) They looked unto him, and were lightened: (ו) And their faces were not ashamed.
(ז) This poor mancried, and the Lordheard him, And saved him out of all his troubles.
(ח) The angel of the Lordencampeth Round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
(ט) O taste and see that the Lordisgood: Blessed isthe man thattrusteth in him.
(י) O fear the Lord, ye his saints: For there isno want to them that fear him.
(כ) The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: But they that seek the Lordshall not want any good thing.
(ל) Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the Lord.
(מ) What man is he thatdesireth life, Andloveth manydays, that hemay see good?
(נ) Keep thy tongue from evil, And thy lips from speaking guile.
(ס) Depart from evil, and do good; Seek peace, and pursue it.
(ע) The eyes of the Lordareupon the righteous, And his ears are openunto their cry.
(פ) The face of the Lordisagainst them that do evil, To cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
(צ) The righteouscry, and the Lordheareth, And delivereth them out of all their troubles.
(ק) The Lordisnigh unto them that are of a broken heart; And saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
(ר) Many arethe afflictions of the righteous: But the Lorddelivereth him out of them all.
(ש) He keepeth all his bones: Not one of them is broken.
(ת) Evil shall slay the wicked: And they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.
(פ) The Lordredeemeth the soul of his servants: And none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
